about_the_game:
A new costume for Conny is added.
A jumpsuit for Conny. Enjoy battles and daily life sections in new fashion.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Conny.
Change into the costume "Kung Fu Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Conny in the Daily Life section.
Change into the costume "Kung Fu Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near Conny.
